posts.post_title: Looking for lower grade but nicely presenting T3 Turkey Red Tris Speaker
posts.post_content: Hey guys, pinholes are fine, just want the image to present nicely for the technical grade. Let me know!

The price sticker residue will come off, of course-

Asking $440.
